p: An aliquot of the crude essential oil was reserved for bioassays and the remainder separated by column chromatography on silica gel (Vetec, 60-270 mesh), eluted with hexane:ethyl acetate (9:1). The fractions of interest, containing ar-turmerone, were analyzed by thin-layer chromatography (0.20 mm thickness, 60-mesh silica gel; Macherey-Nagel, Duren, Germany) visualized with iodine vapor (sublimation) and compared with a previously isolated and identified standard.
